issue.title: [Rust] Support JSON array of objects

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11827?focusedCommentId=17294489) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
I recently added support for writing such format https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9575 so allowing parsing support makes a lot of sense to me
